home.heroText: This year, our new summer collection will be your haven from the world's harsh elements.
home.featuresDescription: We pride ourselves on a foundation of exceptional customer service, where every interaction is a testament to our dedication to excellence.
home.complimentaryShippingText: Enjoy the convenience of free shipping for all orders. We believe in transparent pricing, and the price you see is the price you pay — no surprise fees
home.qualityPromiseText: Shop with confidence knowing that we stand behind our products. Should any issue arise within the first two years, rest assured we're here to help with a hassle-free replacement.
home.easyExchangesText: If your purchase isn't quite right, pass it on to a friend who might love it, and let us know. We're happy to facilitate an exchange to ensure you have the perfect item to complement your lifestyle.

notFoundPage.noPageText: Sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

errorPage.explanation: Please try reloading the page. If the problem continues, try again later.

productSpec.introduction: Step into a world where quality meets quintessential charm with our collection. Every thread weaves a promise of unparalleled quality, ensuring that each garment is not just a part of your wardrobe, but a piece of art. Here's the essence of what makes our apparel the hallmark for those with an eye for excellence and a heart for the environment.
productSpec.sustainabilityIntro: With our sustainable approach, we curate clothing that makes a statement of care—care for the planet, and for the art of fashion.
productSpec.comfortIntro: Our garments are a sanctuary of softness, tailored to drape gracefully and allow for freedom of movement.
productSpec.durabilityIntro: Here’s to apparel that you can trust to look as good as new, wear after wear, year after year.
productSpec.versatilityIntro: Our pieces are a celebration of versatility, offering a range of styles that are as perfect for a business meeting as they are for a casual brunch.

footer.newsText: We’ll send you a nice letter once per week. No spam.
footer.brandText: Craft stunning style journeys that weave more joy into every thread.

filterAndSort.adjustFilters: Adjust your filters a bit, and let's see what we can find!

underConstruction.line1: This app is still under construction!
underConstruction.line2: You're welcome to explore the features that have already been built.
underConstruction.line3: We’re working hard to bring more to you soon — stay tuned!
